div.head: Deletion of text in antiquity
div.p: et del rend="erasure"Getae Caesari/del ob rem publicam
et del rend="erasure"unclear reason="damage"Getae/unclear Caesari/del ob rem publicam
et del rend="erasure"gap id="gap20" reason="illegible" extent="11" unit="character"/certainty target="gap20" locus="extent" degree=".75"//del ob rem publicam
et del rend="erasure"gap id="gap21" reason="lost" extent="11" unit="character"/certainty target="gap21" locus="extent" degree=".75"//del ob rem publicam
et del rend="erasure"gap id="gap22" reason="lost" extent="11" unit="character"/certainty target="gap22" locus="extent" degree=".5"//del ob rem publicam
